name: Light Beam For Cat Joke
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Laser
Light Beam For Cat Joke
The light beam for the Cat Joke - a joke simulation game where you will be able to let the light beam from the phone which will run for your cat or other beloved pet. Play with the cat with the help of laser light directly from the phone completely free of charge and without an internet connection. You can play at home or outdoors or even in the country. Please note that this is only an emulator simulator, it does not bear any harm and created only for fun and entertainment!
Thank you for using our game, leave your feedback and we will do even better!
